value_slices.name: Account Selection with Details Modal
value_slices.user_value: Select an account card to reveal detail options, then click contacts icon to view contact information in a modal

value_slices.name: Enhanced Modal Interactions
value_slices.user_value: Navigate modals naturally with keyboard, click outside to close, and access additional detail types (service agreements)

value_slices.name: Complete Details Access
value_slices.user_value: Access all account details (financial data, account notes) through dedicated icons with proper data formatting and responsive design
